introduction.section1: Malaysia is divided into two parts. West Malaysia (Peninsular or Malaya) includes most of the large modern cities, such as Kuala Lumpur, Johor, and Malacca. While East Malaysia, in the north of Borneo island, is mainly covered by rainforests, populated by animals.
introduction.section2: We let you discover with our articles and photos the different faces of Malaysia.

google-description: Malaysia is divided into two parts. West Malaysia (Peninsular or Malaya) includes most of the large modern cities, such as Kuala Lumpur, Johor, and Malacca. While East Malaysia, in the north of Borneo island, is mainly covered by rainforests, populated by animals. Follow our region-by-region guide to discover our selection of must-see places. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.
